name: df-lininds
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(clininds, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s1)))), wral(s2, co(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(s1))), cmap, cv(s0)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s2), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, cv(s1)))), wceq(co(cv(s2), cfv(clinc, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), cfv(c0g, cv(s1)))), wral(s3, cv(s0), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, cv(s1))))))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ linIndS = { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈ P((Base ` s1))∧ ∀(s2 ∈((Base `(Scalar ` s1))[↦]s0),((s2[finSupp](0 `(Scalar ` s1))∧(s2[(linC ` s1)]s0)=(0 ` s1))→ ∀(s3 ∈ s0,(s2 ` s3)=(0 `(Scalar ` s1))))))}
comment: Define the relation between a module and its linearly independent subsets. (Contributed by AV, 12-Apr-2019.) (Revised by AV, 24-Apr-2019.) (Revised by AV, 30-Jul-2019.)
